summary.overview: This JCL job performs a data backup operation by copying the entire contents of a CARDEMO FTP test backup dataset to create a duplicate copy for internal reader processing or archival purposes.
business_functions: Copy data from source backup dataset to destination backup dataset
Create backup copy of CARDEMO FTP test data for internal reader processing
Preserve all data formatting and record structure during the copy operation

INTRDRJ2.JCL.program_overview: System utility that performs data management operations including dataset copy and backup functions

datasource_summary.name: CARDEMO FTP Test Backup Source Data (AWS.M2.CARDEMO.FTP.TEST.BKUP)
datasource_summary.business_name: CARDEMO FTP Test Backup Source Data
datasource_summary.function: Contains backup data from the CARDEMO FTP test environment that serves as the source for data copying operations

datasource_summary.name: CARDEMO FTP Test Backup Target for Internal Reader (AWS.M2.CARDEMO.FTP.TEST.BKUP.INTRDR)
datasource_summary.business_name: CARDEMO FTP Test Backup Target for Internal Reader
datasource_summary.function: Receives copied backup data from the source dataset and prepares it for internal reader processing

datasource_summary.name: System Processing Messages and Reports (SYSPRINT)
datasource_summary.function: Captures system utility messages, processing reports, and status information for monitoring and auditing purposes

datasource_summary.name: Data Copy Control Instructions (SYSIN)
datasource_summary.function: Contains control statements that specify how data should be copied from the source file to the target file

flow_diagram_code:
flowchart TD
    IDCAMS["System utility that performs data management operations including dataset copy and backup functions (IDCAMS) "]
